name: electron-open-link-in-browser
description: Open a link in browser for Electron and browser.

scripts.build:browser: npm update && npm prune && npm dedupe && browserify -u shell --standalone electronOpenLinkInBrowser ./index.js | dereserve > build/electron-open-link-in-browser.js
scripts.lint: npm run eclint && npm run eslint

readme: # electron-open-link-in-browser [![NPM version][npm-image]][npm-url] [![Travis-CI Status][travis-image]][travis-url] [![Appveyor Status][appveyor-image]][appveyor-url] [![Daviddm Status][daviddm-image]][daviddm-url] > Open a link in browser for Electron and browser. #### Electron app to browser ![Electron to browser](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/75448/9560922/626a5610-4e6a-11e5-9a1f-af9c2cd43f38.gif) #### browser to browser ![browser to browser](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/75448/9560923/6a926ba2-4e6a-11e5-84ff-3be91ad410d3.gif) ## Install ``` $ npm install --save electron-open-link-in-browser ``` ## Usage ```html github.com/lyrictenor/electron-triage-for-github ``` ### React.js + JSX + Browserify/Webpack ```html var electronOpenLinkInBrowser = require("electron-open-link-in-browser"); github.com/lyrictenor/electron-triage-for-github ``` ## API ### electronOpenLinkInBrowser([url,] event) Jump to the href property. #### url *Optional* Type: `string` Jump to url. ## Changelog [changelog.md](./changelog.md). ## License MIT Â© [sanemat](http://sane.jp) [travis-url]: https://travis-ci.org/lyrictenor/electron-open-link-in-browser [travis-image]: https://img.shields.io/travis/lyrictenor/electron-open-link-in-browser/master.svg?style=flat-square&label=travis [appveyor-url]: https://ci.appveyor.com/project/sanemat/electron-open-link-in-browser/branch/master [appveyor-image]: https://img.shields.io/appveyor/ci/sanemat/electron-open-link-in-browser/master.svg?style=flat-square&label=appveyor [npm-url]: https://npmjs.org/package/electron-open-link-in-browser [npm-image]: https://img.shields.io/npm/v/electron-open-link-in-browser.svg?style=flat-square [daviddm-url]: https://david-dm.org/lyrictenor/electron-open-link-in-browser [daviddm-image]: https://img.shields.io/david/lyrictenor/electron-open-link-in-browser.svg?style=flat-square
